title: Hercules 15 Amp 42 lb. 1-1/8 in. Hex Lower Wall Breaker Hammer

card.shortDescription: Heavy-duty breaker hammer for demolishing walls and concrete.

description:
- Model: HEX-42LB
- Power: 15 Amp motor
- Weight: 42 lbs
- Applications: Designed for breaking concrete, lower walls, and other demolition tasks.
- Features: Ergonomic D-shaped handle for better control, low vibration for user comfort, 1-1/8 in. hex shank for secure bit retention, and high-impact energy for faster breaking.
- Accessories: Includes chisel bit and durable carrying case.
searchTags: Hercules breaker hammer, 42 lb demolition tool, concrete breaker, 15 amp hex breaker, demolition equipment, wall breaker
